summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing an agreement with the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle (METRO) AND King County for preparation of an application to the United States, Department of Energy for a feasibility study under its Alternate Fuels Production Program; authorizing acceptance of funds; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1980 Budget of the Energy Office; authorizing payment by the Department of Administrative Services and a contigent expenditure from the City Light Fund; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
